suggestedTasks.title: Implement Server-Sent Events (SSE) for Task Signals
suggestedTasks.description: Replace polling mechanism with SSE for more efficient real-time updates in TaskDetailDrawer. Currently using setInterval polling, but existing SSE stores (taskEvents.ts, sessionEvents.ts) suggest a more performant approach. Refactor the current polling implementation to use SSE for signal updates, reducing unnecessary API calls and improving real-time responsiveness.
suggestedTasks.reason: Identified more efficient alternative to current polling implementation
